1041070.name: The Driver's Mission
1041070.description:
The Driver's Mission is a very challenging multi-mode racing game. Aside from regular racing modes which requires players to get to the finish-line first, This game includes modes such as:
1. "championship cup" (which requires users to go through group stage, quarter final stage and final stage to win a cup)
2. "Police chase mode" (Requires players to avoid police cars on the chase),
3. "Police officer mode" (Requires player to act as the police and destroy all criminal cars)
4. "1 vs 1 mode" (Player races with another car)
5. “Drag race”
6. “Elimination Mode” (Player needs to avoid the last position on count down)
7. “Timing mode” (Player needs to get to finish line before time-out. There are obstacles on the way)
8. “Solo mode” (Player needs to get to finish line before time-out. There are no obstacles on the way)
9. “Nitro mode” (Player collects nitro to boost speed and to keep increase points. Player loses when point hits 0)
10. “Legendary mode” (player racing with extremely fast cars)
